data.About:
>25 years in the Pharma, CRO and tech(bio) sectors as a medicinal chemist and executive manager.  Significant experience across Discovery and early Development of small molecules.  Therapeutic area expertise within Neuroscience & pain.  Leveraging the power of generative design with cutting edge automation.  Application of multimodal data types to contemporary drug discovery.  iPSCs in drug discovery and protein degradation therapeutic modalities.

Educated at Cambridge University and the University of Manchester (PhD) followed by post-doctoral research at The University of Texas (Austin).

data.About: A private pilot with instrument rating, Eduardo combines his love for aviation with over 25 years of entrepreneurial success in the tech industry. As former CTO at GoodRx, advisor to numerous startups, and a successful consultant, he's adept at leveraging technology for growth. His deep Machine Learning expertise since 2015 positions him to lead Aboard AI at the exciting intersection of aviation and artificial intelligence.
data.Location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States, North America

Experience.Description:
We're transforming the way pilots fly by harnessing the power of real-time intelligence on every aircraft. Our innovative technology processes sensor and avionics data locally, delivering cloud-grade insights without relying on internet connectivity.

• Real-time flight insights: Voice-based alerts for sharper decision-making and reduced workload
• Predictive maintenance: Early detection of mechanical issues, computed onboard
• Scalable ML models: Trained on your own flight telemetry, adaptable to any mission, executed locally

Our Mission: To revolutionize aviation safety through universal access to real-time intelligence.

Join us in revolutionizing aviation safety. Want a live demo or explore a partnership? Let's connect and take the first step towards safer skies.

Experience.Location: San Francisco, California, United States, North America

Experience.Description:
Xometry is an on-demand marketplace for custom manufacturing. It began trading on the NASDAQ as $XMTR in June of 2021.

As CTO (Aug 2014 - Feb 2017), I built the software team from scratch. As a team, we created a system that instantly quotes the price of manufacturing a custom part based on an uploaded CAD file and automatically places the job with a nationwide network of manufacturing partners. 

As CSO (Feb 2017 - Jan 2018) I invented a patented method for pricing work in a two-sided marketplace that optimizes business outcomes based on machine learning predictions of customer win rates and supply-side acceptance rates.
Experience.Title: Chief Technology Officer and Chief Science Officer
Experience.Location: Gaithersburg, Maryland, United States, North America

data.About:
I am a technologist, operator, and investor.  I am good at connecting dots and like delivering great products informed by macro trends and customer needs.

I am passionate about new technologies and business models and their potential to transform industry and help the climate.  I am particularly interested in the intersection of digital and physical and how to make things that happen in the real world more customer-centric, data-driven, and sustainable.  

I am an experienced venture investor, start-up executive, and management consultant and have spent my career bringing new technologies to market.  I have focused on start-ups but have also built a deep understanding of large companies and incumbents and how start-ups can work with or work around them.   I am looking to work with great entrepreneurs to help build great companies and a better future.
